Title: [BETA] Pitch Black
Description:
Crawl around in the nighttime of a dying world as two new custom campaigns, The Beacon and The Photomaniac.

Make your way home safely before the rising dawn wakes, uncover the hidden secrets of this world, and piece together its fractured story.
